text: Józef Pazdur (22 November 1924 - 7 May 2015) was a Polish Roman Catholic bishop. He became a priest in 1951. He was later named auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Wrocław in 1984, and retired in 2000. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Polish Roman Catholic bishops
title: Józef Pazdur
